title: The Cartographer
description: While exploring a cave in a remote section of Carlsbad, New Mexico with his friend Sam, 16-year-old Nathan Chambers stumbles upon a stranger from another planet. Surprised by the encounter, the stranger abducts Nathan and sets forth a chain of events that will forever change the balance of the universe. An ancient war will be renewed, threatening to tear at the very fabric of the universe. Nathan has a special talent, one that can help unlock an ancient artifact and prevent the war before it threatens the very things he holds dear. Will mankind be pushed to the brink of extinction once again?
author: Craig Gaydas
